llm_text:
Why: The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP +2.8679), which strongly increases the alert score, combined with a large amount_received (14593.3; SHAP +1.0824) and amount_paid (14593.3; SHAP +0.5777) that further increase the score. dayofweek (value=5; SHAP +0.4417) also contributes upward pressure. Partially offsetting these effects is to_bank (25547; SHAP −0.4845), which decreases the score.

Conclusion: The transaction was flagged because an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) of notable size (amount_received/amount_paid ≈ 14,593.3) raised the model score, with weekday timing (dayofweek=5) adding modestly. The receiving bank (to_bank=25547) reduced the score somewhat. If further review is pursued, prioritize verification of the ACH payment and the payment amounts, noting that the to_bank feature may moderate model concern.
